post.text: We think Donald J. Trump's been involved in more than 5,500 lawsuits. We're going to try to read them all in under four hours.

comment.author: Shelby
comment.text: Republican speakers twist facts on immigration, crime, Benghazi and employment.

replies.author: Alyssa
replies.text: I suppose Sean Mom twisted things all around?

replies.author: Madison
replies.text: How about all the young sons that die in Bush war?

replies.author: Kelsey
replies.text: They used her as a political pawn!

replies.author: Madison
replies.text: I wonder how much did Trump pay her'
